messages.content: Johnny Fisher works with Christopher Peterson.
Christopher Peterson is a colleague of Kathleen Herrera.
Kathleen Herrera works with Linda Brooks.
Linda Brooks is a colleague of Amanda Myers.
Amanda Myers works with Janet Edwards.
Janet Edwards is a colleague of Cynthia Scott.
Cynthia Scott works with Lawrence Scott.
Lawrence Scott is a colleague of Abigail Harris.
Abigail Harris works with Joan Morgan.
Joan Morgan is a colleague of Brenda Nguyen.

queries.question: Are Brenda Nguyen and Johnny Fisher related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
